column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Officer says : " Chief Beifong ? "
#Text=Lin says : " I 'm too late .
#Text=Come on , let 's gets you out of here .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'll ask you one more time ; where is she ?
#Text=" Equalist says : " We do n't have the Avatar , and the Equalists did n't attack City Hall .
#Text=Tarrlok 's lying .
#Text=" Mako says : " What ?
#Text=" Lin says : " I scanned the entire prison .
#Text=Korra 's not here .
#Text=" Mako says : " Why would Tarrlok make up a story about getting attacked ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Because he has Korra .
#Text=He fooled us all !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Let 's go , people !
#Text=" Bolin says : " Try to chi block that , fools !
#Text=" Lin says : " We 've got more company !
#Text=Hang on !
#Text=" Prosecution attorney says : " Yakone has ruled Republic City 's criminal empire for years .
#Text=Yet he has always managed to stay out of the law 's reach , until now .
#Text=You will hear testimony , from dozens of his victims , and they will tell you , Yakone has maintained his grip on the underworld by using an ability that has been illegal for decades .
#Text=Bloodbending .
#Text=" Defense attorney says : " The prosecution 's entire case is built upon the make - believe notion that my client is able to bloodbend at will , at any time on any day .
#Text=I remind the council that bloodbending is an incredibly rare skill and it can only be performed during a full moon .
#Text=Yet , the witnesses will claim that my client used bloodbending at every other time except during a full moon .
#Text=It would be a mockery of justice to convict a man of a crime that is impossible to commit .
#Text="
